plot: Tin is being lured into Saigon's underground motorcycle racing scene by fast money. Goldie works at a hostess bar and is looking for a way out. Together, they struggle to define their ambiguous romance when Goldie becomes pregnant.
title: Burn to Send
plot_es: Tin is being lured into Saigon's underground motorcycle racing scene by fast money. Goldie works at a hostess bar and is looking for a way out. Together, they struggle to define their ambiguous romance when Goldie becomes pregnant.
